name: Regional Dashboard
query:
SELECT 
    COALESCE(
        t_manager.name,
        t_direct.name,
        'No Territory'
    ) as territory,
    sp.name as sales_person,
    COALESCE(sales_data.total_sales, 0) as total_sales,
    COALESCE(targets.sales_goal, 0) as sales_goal,
    COALESCE(sil_data.current_sil, 0) as current_sil,
    COALESCE(targets.sil_goal, 0) as sil_goal,
    ROUND(
        CASE 
            WHEN COALESCE(targets.sales_goal, 0) > 0 
            THEN (COALESCE(sales_data.total_sales, 0) / targets.sales_goal * 100)
            ELSE 0 
        END, 
    2) as sales_goal_percent,
    ROUND(
        CASE 
            WHEN COALESCE(targets.sil_goal, 0) > 0 
            THEN (COALESCE(sil_data.current_sil, 0) / targets.sil_goal * 100)
            ELSE 0 
        END,
    2) as sil_goal_percent,
    
    -- NEW ACCOUNT COLUMNS
    COALESCE(accounts.total_accounts, 0) as total_accounts,
    COALESCE(accounts.active_accounts, 0) as active_accounts,
    COALESCE(accounts.inactive_accounts, 0) as inactive_accounts,
    COALESCE(accounts.growth_accounts, 0) as growth_accounts,
    COALESCE(accounts.new_accounts, 0) as new_accounts

FROM 
    `tabSales Person` sp
LEFT JOIN `tabTerritory` t_direct ON t_direct.territory_manager = sp.name
LEFT JOIN `tabTerritory` t_manager ON t_manager.territory_manager = sp.parent_sales_person
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
        st.sales_person,
        SUM(si.grand_total) as total_sales
    FROM `tabSales Invoice` si
    INNER JOIN `tabSales Team` st ON st.parent = si.name
    WHERE si.docstatus = 1
        AND (%(from_date)s = '' OR %(from_date)s IS NULL OR si.posting_date >= %(from_date)s)
        AND (%(to_date)s = '' OR %(to_date)s IS NULL OR si.posting_date <= %(to_date)s)
    GROUP BY st.sales_person
) as sales_data ON sales_data.sales_person = sp.name
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
        st.sales_person,
        SUM(sii.amount) as current_sil
    FROM `tabSales Invoice` si
    INNER JOIN `tabSales Team` st ON st.parent = si.name
    INNER JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item` sii ON sii.parent = si.name
    INNER JOIN `tabItem` item ON item.name = sii.item_code
    WHERE si.docstatus = 1
        AND item.item_group = 'SIL'
        AND (%(from_date)s = '' OR %(from_date)s IS NULL OR si.posting_date >= %(from_date)s)
        AND (%(to_date)s = '' OR %(to_date)s IS NULL OR si.posting_date <= %(to_date)s)
    GROUP BY st.sales_person
) as sil_data ON sil_data.sales_person = sp.name
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
        parent as sales_person,
        SUM(CASE WHEN item_group = 'Products' THEN target_amount ELSE 0 END) as sales_goal,
        SUM(CASE WHEN item_group = 'SIL' THEN target_amount ELSE 0 END) as sil_goal
    FROM `tabTarget Detail`
    GROUP BY parent
) as targets ON targets.sales_person = sp.name

-- FIXED: Account Analytics Join - Match on first and last name (ignore middle initial)
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
        sp_inner.name as sales_person,
        
        -- Total Accounts
        COUNT(DISTINCT c.name) as total_accounts,
        
        -- Active Accounts: Purchased in PRIOR calendar quarter
        COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
            WHEN EXISTS (
                SELECT 1 
                FROM `tabSales Invoice` si_prior
                INNER JOIN `tabSales Team` st_prior ON st_prior.parent = si_prior.name
                WHERE si_prior.customer = c.name
                    AND st_prior.sales_person = sp_inner.name
                    AND si_prior.docstatus = 1
                    AND si_prior.posting_date >= CASE 
                        WHEN QUARTER(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) = 1 
                        THEN CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) - 1, '-10-01')
                        WHEN QUARTER(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) = 2 
                        THEN CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-01-01')
                        WHEN QUARTER(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) = 3 
                        THEN CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-04-01')
                        ELSE CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-07-01')
                    END
                    AND si_prior.posting_date < CASE 
                        WHEN QUARTER(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) = 1 
                        THEN CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-01-01')
                        WHEN QUARTER(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) = 2 
                        THEN CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-04-01')
                        WHEN QUARTER(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) = 3 
                        THEN CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-07-01')
                        ELSE CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-10-01')
                    END
            ) THEN c.name 
        END) as active_accounts,
        
        -- Inactive Accounts
        COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
            WHEN NOT EXISTS (
                SELECT 1 
                FROM `tabSales Invoice` si_prior
                INNER JOIN `tabSales Team` st_prior ON st_prior.parent = si_prior.name
                WHERE si_prior.customer = c.name
                    AND st_prior.sales_person = sp_inner.name
                    AND si_prior.docstatus = 1
                    AND si_prior.posting_date >= CASE 
                        WHEN QUARTER(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) = 1 
                        THEN CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) - 1, '-10-01')
                        WHEN QUARTER(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) = 2 
                        THEN CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-01-01')
                        WHEN QUARTER(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) = 3 
                        THEN CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-04-01')
                        ELSE CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-07-01')
                    END
                    AND si_prior.posting_date < CASE 
                        WHEN QUARTER(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) = 1 
                        THEN CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-01-01')
                        WHEN QUARTER(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) = 2 
                        THEN CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-04-01')
                        WHEN QUARTER(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) = 3 
                        THEN CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-07-01')
                        ELSE CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-10-01')
                    END
            ) THEN c.name 
        END) as inactive_accounts,
        
        -- Growth Accounts
        COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
            WHEN NOT EXISTS (
                SELECT 1 
                FROM `tabSales Invoice` si_prior
                INNER JOIN `tabSales Team` st_prior ON st_prior.parent = si_prior.name
                WHERE si_prior.customer = c.name
                    AND st_prior.sales_person = sp_inner.name
                    AND si_prior.docstatus = 1
                    AND si_prior.posting_date >= CASE 
                        WHEN QUARTER(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) = 1 
                        THEN CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) - 1, '-10-01')
                        WHEN QUARTER(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) = 2 
                        THEN CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-01-01')
                        WHEN QUARTER(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) = 3 
                        THEN CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-04-01')
                        ELSE CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-07-01')
                    END
                    AND si_prior.posting_date < CASE 
                        WHEN QUARTER(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) = 1 
                        THEN CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-01-01')
                        WHEN QUARTER(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) = 2 
                        THEN CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-04-01')
                        WHEN QUARTER(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())) = 3 
                        THEN CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-07-01')
                        ELSE CONCAT(YEAR(COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())), '-10-01')
                    END
            )
            AND EXISTS (
                SELECT 1 
                FROM `tabSales Invoice` si_current
                INNER JOIN `tabSales Team` st_current ON st_current.parent = si_current.name
                WHERE si_current.customer = c.name
                    AND st_current.sales_person = sp_inner.name
                    AND si_current.docstatus = 1
                    AND (%(from_date)s = '' OR %(from_date)s IS NULL OR si_current.posting_date >= %(from_date)s)
                    AND (%(to_date)s = '' OR %(to_date)s IS NULL OR si_current.posting_date <= %(to_date)s)
            ) THEN c.name 
        END) as growth_accounts,
        
        -- New Accounts
        COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
            WHEN c.creation >= COALESCE(%(from_date)s, CURDATE())
            AND c.creation <= COALESCE(%(to_date)s, CURDATE())
            THEN c.name 
        END) as new_accounts
        
    FROM `tabSales Person` sp_inner
    LEFT JOIN `tabUser` u ON (
        -- Match first and last name, ignoring middle initial
        CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(u.full_name, ' ', 1), ' ', SUBSTRING_INDEX(u.full_name, ' ', -1))
        = CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(sp_inner.name, ' ', 1), ' ', SUBSTRING_INDEX(sp_inner.name, ' ', -1))
    )
    INNER JOIN `tabCustomer` c ON c.account_manager = u.email
    WHERE sp_inner.enabled = 1
    GROUP BY sp_inner.name
) as accounts ON accounts.sales_person = sp.name

WHERE 
    sp.enabled = 1
    AND sp.name != 'Sales Team'
ORDER BY 
    sp.name
report_script:
def flt(val):
    try:
        return float(val or 0)
    except Exception:
        return 0.0


def execute(filters=None):
    if not filters:
        filters = {}
    columns = get_columns()
    data = get_data(filters) or []
    return columns, data


def get_columns():
    return [
        {"fieldname": "sales_person", "label": "REP", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "Sales Person", "width": 180},
        {"fieldname": "total_sales", "label": "Current Account Rev", "fieldtype": "Currency", "width": 150},
        {"fieldname": "sales_goal", "label": "Account Goal", "fieldtype": "Currency", "width": 130},
        {"fieldname": "current_sil", "label": "Current SIL", "fieldtype": "Currency", "width": 130},
        {"fieldname": "sil_goal", "label": "Goal SIL", "fieldtype": "Currency", "width": 130},
        {"fieldname": "sales_goal_percent", "label": "REV Goal", "fieldtype": "Data", "width": 120},
        {"fieldname": "sil_goal_percent", "label": "SIL Goal", "fieldtype": "Data", "width": 120},
    ]


def get_data(filters):
    sales_persons = frappe.get_all(
        "Sales Person",
        filters={"enabled": 1},
        fields=["name"],
        order_by="name asc",
    )

    if not sales_persons:
        return []

    data = []
    for sp in sales_persons:
        sales_person_name = sp.get("name") if isinstance(sp, dict) else getattr(sp, "name", sp)

        targets_query = (
            "SELECT\\n"
            "    SUM(CASE WHEN item_group = 'Products' THEN target_amount ELSE 0 END) as sales_goal,\\n"
            "    SUM(CASE WHEN item_group = 'SIL' THEN target_amount ELSE 0 END) as sil_goal\\n"
            "FROM `tabTarget Detail`\\n"
            "WHERE parent = %(sales_person)s"
        )
        targets = frappe.db.sql(targets_query, {"sales_person": sales_person_name}, as_dict=1)

        sales_goal = flt(targets[0].get("sales_goal")) if targets else 0
        sil_goal = flt(targets[0].get("sil_goal")) if targets else 0

        total_sales = get_sales_for_person(sales_person_name, filters)
        current_sil = get_sil_sales_for_person(sales_person_name, filters)

        sales_goal_percent = f"{round((flt(total_sales) / flt(sales_goal) * 100), 2)}%" if sales_goal > 0 else "0%"
        sil_goal_percent = f"{round((flt(current_sil) / flt(sil_goal) * 100), 2)}%" if sil_goal > 0 else "0%"

        data.append(
            {
                "sales_person": sales_person_name,
                "total_sales": total_sales,
                "sales_goal": sales_goal,
                "current_sil": current_sil,
                "sil_goal": sil_goal,
                "sales_goal_percent": sales_goal_percent,
                "sil_goal_percent": sil_goal_percent,
            }
        )

    return data


def get_sales_for_person(sales_person, filters):
    conditions = []
    values = {"sales_person": sales_person}

    if filters.get("from_date"):
        conditions.append("si.posting_date >= %(from_date)s")
        values["from_date"] = filters.get("from_date")

    if filters.get("to_date"):
        conditions.append("si.posting_date <= %(to_date)s")
        values["to_date"] = filters.get("to_date")

    where_clause = ("AND " + " AND ".join(conditions)) if conditions else ""

    sales_query = (
        "SELECT SUM(si.grand_total) as total\\n"
        "FROM `tabSales Invoice` si\\n"
        "INNER JOIN `tabSales Team` st ON st.parent = si.name\\n"
        "WHERE si.docstatus = 1\\n"
        "    AND st.sales_person = %(sales_person)s\\n"
        + (where_clause + "\\n" if where_clause else "")
    )
    result = frappe.db.sql(sales_query, values, as_dict=1)

    return flt(result[0].get("total")) if result else 0


def get_sil_sales_for_person(sales_person, filters):
    conditions = []
    values = {"sales_person": sales_person}

    if filters.get("from_date"):
        conditions.append("si.posting_date >= %(from_date)s")
        values["from_date"] = filters.get("from_date")

    if filters.get("to_date"):
        conditions.append("si.posting_date <= %(to_date)s")
        values["to_date"] = filters.get("to_date")

    where_clause = ("AND " + " AND ".join(conditions)) if conditions else ""

    sil_query = (
        "SELECT SUM(sii.amount) as total\\n"
        "FROM `tabSales Invoice` si\\n"
        "INNER JOIN `tabSales Team` st ON st.parent = si.name\\n"
        "INNER JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item` sii ON sii.parent = si.name\\n"
        "INNER JOIN `tabItem` item ON item.name = sii.item_code\\n"
        "WHERE si.docstatus = 1\\n"
        "    AND st.sales_person = %(sales_person)s\\n"
        "    AND item.item_group = 'SIL'\\n"
        + (where_clause + "\\n" if where_clause else "")
    )
    result = frappe.db.sql(sil_query, values, as_dict=1)

    return flt(result[0].get("total")) if result else 0
